name: The Predictability of Fate
description:
The Predictability of Fate

Play as Zephyr, the crown prince and “chosen one”. While on a quest to save a missing priestess, he reveals to his best friend Helios that he isn’t actually from this world!...

Classic RPG with a twist. No combat, multiple ends. Takes about 15-30 minutes to complete. Game made entirely with RPG Maker VX Ace game engine and its internal assets and resources. No scripts were used.
CW: Mild unreality.

Hi everyone! I finished my entry for My first game jam, The Predictability of Fate! It’s free to download, so please play it <3

This game was a challenge to limit myself to the resources of the game engine instead of making my own assets (which is what I do for my usual projects, not that any of them are released yet). So I thought, why not play with the player's expectation and add a twist to that?...

I hope you like it!
